articles.author: Scott Disavino
articles.title: Oil prices climb 2% to 4-month high with sanctions expected to disrupt Russian supplies - Reuters
articles.description: Oil prices climbed about 2% to a four-month high on Monday on expectations that wider U.S. sanctions on Russian oil would force buyers in India and China to seek other suppliers.

articles.title: A Texas man is arrested in Indianapolis on a charge of stalking WNBA's Caitlin Clark - NPR
articles.description: The 55-year-old man sent the basketball star threatening and sexually explicit messages on social media, then traveled from Texas to Indianapolis to try to encounter her in person, prosecutors say.
articles.content: Authorities in Indiana have arrested a man on a felony stalking charge after he allegedly sent harassing messages to basketball star Caitlin Clark, then traveled to Indianapolis in an attempt to see … [+3282 chars]
